catalog_info.title: Core Course in Health Policy
catalog_info.notes: Required of doctoral candidates in Health Policy and open to others by permission of the instructor. Offered jointly with the Kennedy School as SUP-957 and with Public Health as HPM 246.
catalog_info.description: Topics include the financing and organization of health care, public health, political analysis, medical manpower, health law and ethics, technology assessment, prevention, mental health, long-term care, and quality of care. Part one of a two-part series.
